column1: Smoque BBQ////Now to the part all of you care about
column2: the meat. The baby back ribs fall off the bone so easily
column3: and yet they are not greasy in any way. The only thing that comes off on your fingers is a little bit of dry rub and the occasional sauce you wound up getting your fingers into by accident. The brisket was so tender and moist I was actually quite happy eating it without any sauce at all. However
column4: I can recommend all of their sauces. Based on what you like
column6: or a smokey and sweet Memphis sauce you will find one you like. They even have a spicy Memphis style; however
column7: I did not find it to be substantially hotter. I was not expecting to find a gem like this in Chicago.
